institutions.name: Commission on Elections
institutions.description: Constitutional commission responsible for enforcing election laws in the Philippines

fields.label: I, [Name], Filipino, born on [Date], a duly registered voter in:

options.label: Precinct No. _____, Barangay ___________, City/Municipality of _____________, Province of __________________

fields.label: I have resided in my new residence for:

options.label: Sentenced by final judgment to suffer imprisonment for not less than one (1) year
Convicted by final judgment of a crime involving disloyalty to the duly constituted government, etc;
Declared by competent authority to be insane or incompetent
Failed to vote in two (2) successive preceding regular elections

fields.label: Change/Correction of Data (for Change of Name/Correction only):

options.label: Reinstatement of records due to transfer from foreign post to same local City/Municipality/District
Inclusion of VRR in the precinct book of voters
Reinstatement of the name of the registered voter which has been omitted in the list of voters

fields.label: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I hereunto affix my signature
SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN to before me on the above date.
Inclusion/Reinstatement Request
fields.defaultValue: I do hereby request that my name which has been omitted in the list of voters/my registration record which has not been included in the precinct book of voters of Precinct No. _______, be reinstated/included therein. The said reinstatement of name/inclusion of registration record is necessary and valid.

sections.name: Part 1 - PERSONAL INFORMATION
sections.instructions: To be filled out by Applicant

fields.label: PERIOD OF RESIDENCE IN THE PHILIPPINES
PERIOD OF RESIDENCE IN THE CITY/MUNICIPALITY
If naturalized/reacquired, state date of naturalization/reacquisition and Certificate Number

conditional.show: special_categories INCLUDES 'person_with_disability' OR special_categories INCLUDES 'senior_citizen' OR special_categories INCLUDES 'illiterate'

fields.label: Are you willing to vote in the Accessible Polling Place (APP) located on the ground floor?
Assistor's Name
fields.instructions: Fill out and attach Certification/Attestation Form

conditional.show: special_categories INCLUDES 'illiterate' OR special_categories INCLUDES 'person_with_disability' OR special_categories INCLUDES 'senior_citizen'

options.label: I signify and confirm my intention to undergo the process of voter registration (18 years old and above)
I signify and confirm my intention to undergo the process of voter registration in the Katipunan ng Kabataan (15 to 17 years old)

fields.label: OATH, NOTICE and CONSENT (REGULAR)
fields.text: I do solemnly swear that the above statements regarding my person are true and correct; that I possess all the qualifications and none of the disqualifications of a voter; and that I am: not registered in any precinct; registered in a precinct of another City/Municipality/District in the Philippines and that I have reviewed the entries encoded in the VRS and I confirm that the same are correct, accurate and consistent with the information I supplied in this application form. Further, by affixing my signature below, I authorize and give my consent to the Commission on Elections and the concerned Election Registration Board to collect and process the personal data I supplied herein for purposes of voter registration and elections, and for other purposes and allowable disclosures under B.P. Blg. 881, R.A. No. 8189, 10173 and 10367, and the relevant Resolutions of the Commission on Elections.

options.label: registered in a precinct of another City/Municipality/District in the Philippines

fields.label: OATH, NOTICE and CONSENT (KATIPUNAN NG KABATAAN)
fields.text: I do solemnly swear that the above statements regarding my person are true and correct; that I possess all the qualifications and none of the disqualifications of a voter of Katipunan ng Kabataan; that I am: not registered in any precinct registered in a precinct of another City/Municipality/District in the Philippines and that I have reviewed the entries encoded in the VRS and I confirm that the same are correct, accurate and consistent with the information I supplied in this application form. Moreover, by affixing my signature below, I authorize and give my consent to the Commission on Elections and the concerned Election Registration Board to collect and process the personal data I supplied herein for purposes of voter's registration and elections, and for other purposes and allowable disclosures under B.P. Blg. 881, R.A. No. 8189, 10173 and 10367, and 10742 and the relevant resolutions of the Commission on Elections. Furthermore, I understand that when I reach eighteen (18) years of age, the personal data I supplied herein will be further processed by the Commission on Elections, and upon approval by the Election Registration Board, will be included in and consolidated with the database of voters who are at least eighteen (18) years of age for purposes of subsequent elections and for other lawful purposes and allowable disclosures mentioned above, to which further processing and its purposes I give my consent do not give my consent and that when I reach thirty one (31) years of age, my personal data in the Katipunan ng Kabataan database will be deleted accordingly.

options.label: registered in a precinct of another City/Municipality/District in the Philippines

components.label: Consent for data transfer at age 18

sections.name: Part 3 - ACTION BY THE ELECTION REGISTRATION BOARD

fields.label: Acknowledgement Message
fields.text: This is to acknowledge receipt of your application. Your application is subject for Approval/Disapproval by the Election Registration Board (ERB). You need not appear in the ERB hearing unless required through a written notice.

fields.label: EO/ Interviewer Signature above Printed Name

residenceRequirements.requirement: Must have resided in the Philippines for at least one (1) year
Must have resided in the city/municipality for at least six (6) months

change_name_correction: Certified Copy or Certificate of Court Order
reactivation: Certification/order of the court (for imprisonment, disloyalty, insanity, loss of citizenship, court exclusion)

legalReferences: R.A. No. 10742 (Sangguniang Kabataan Reform Act of 2015)
